artist: After Jan Lievens; Thomas A. E. Chambars
description: nearly 3/4 length portrait of man with curly hair, moustache and small beard; wearing fur trimmed coat, white vest with many buttons and flat white collar; holding wide brimmed hat and cane in PR hand
marks:
Signature, and Title,  

in plate in black: Vol. See Inscription
title: Portrait of Nicholas Laniere
